creator: hsapache@online.de
text:
URL 1: [...]controller.jsp?handler=Link&querie=LIKE%20'3900.%'
URL 2: [...]controller.jsp?handler=Link&querie=LIKE%20'3900.'

Tomcat 3.2.1
URL1: I get the parameters 'handler' and 'querie'.
URL2: I get the parameters 'handler' and 'querie'.

Tomcat 4.0.1
URL1: I get the parameter 'handler' BUT NOT 'querie'.
URL2: I get the parameters 'handler' and 'querie'.
